headerDisplay:
TP-Link Smart Home Plugin.

Most users do not require configuration and can just click "Save" to get started. See [README](https://github.com/plasticrake/homebridge-tplink-smarthome/blob/master/README.md) for more information.

powerStrip.title: Create Multi-Outlet Devices as a Power Strip
powerStrip.description: Enable to create a single power strip accessory with multiple outlets, used for models HS107, KP200, HS300, KP303, KP400, and EP40. Default: false

addCustomCharacteristics.title: Adds energy monitoring characteristics viewable in Eve app
addCustomCharacteristics.description:
Plug: Amperes, KilowattHours, VoltAmperes, Volts, Watts.
Bulb: Watts
Default: false

emeterPollingInterval.title: Energy Monitoring Polling Interval (seconds)
emeterPollingInterval.description: How often to check device energy monitoring the background (seconds). Set to 0 to disable.

inUseThreshold.title: In Use Threshold (Watts)
inUseThreshold.description: (Watts) For plugs that support energy monitoring (e.g. HS110), min power draw for OutletInUse

switchModels.description: Matching models are created in HomeKit as a Switch instead of an Outlet. Default: ['HS200', 'HS210']

discoveryPort.title: Port
discoveryPort.description: Port to bind UDP socket for discovery. If port is not specified or is 0, the operating system will attempt to bind to a random port. Default: 0

broadcast.title: Broadcast Address
broadcast.description: Broadcast Address. If discovery is not working tweak to match your subnet, eg: 192.168.0.255

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval (seconds)
pollingInterval.description: How often to check device status in the background (seconds)

deviceTypes.title: Device Types
deviceTypes.description: Choose which types of devices this plugin should discover

macAddresses.title: Allow MAC Addresses
macAddresses.description: Allow-list of mac addresses to include. If specified will ignore other devices. Supports glob-style patterns

excludeMacAddresses.title: Exclude MAC Addresses
excludeMacAddresses.description: Deny-list of mac addresses to exclude. Supports glob-style patterns

transport.description: Use TCP or UDP for device communication. Discovery will always use UDP. Default: UDP

waitTimeUpdate.title: Wait Time Update (ms)
waitTimeUpdate.description: The time (ms) to wait to combine similar commands for a device before sending a command to a device. Default: 100.

devicesUseDiscoveryPort.title: Devices Use Discovery Port
devicesUseDiscoveryPort.description: When true, sets the device port to the port the device used when responding to the discovery ping. When false, always uses default port (9999). You probably don't want to change this.

layout.title: HomeKit (Optional)
layout.description: Customize how devices are exposed in HomeKit

items.title: Manual Discovery
items.description: If automatic discovery is not working, try this.

items.helpvalue: Before resorting to manually specifying devices. Try setting the broadcast address and check your router/switch/firewall configuration. You must assign static IP addresses to your devices to use this configuration.

layout.title: Advanced Settings (Optional)
layout.description: Don't change these, unless you understand what you're doing.
